step1: Photogrid Guide application is a free and easy to use app, which helps you create eye-catching images for social media. It is one of the simplest and most commonly used photo collage patterns
step2: It is much more than a collage maker. It also comes with stylish filters and an extensive meme and GIF library. Pretty much everything you want to do with images and text can be done in PhotoGrid. The app is always updating its media catalogue, which you can access with a subscription, along with many other advanced features. Moreover, PhotoGrid now provides online editing service
step3: It allows you to do much more than just create collages and edit photos. With this app you can add emoticons and text to your photo, edit it freely and not only with default filters, and it even allows you to create presentations for work or school
step5: Note that you can also add videos to your collage, change the color of the border of the grid, put emojis on it or any other element you want. However, if you want to put a white background on one of the photos, you will have to do it in a separate app.
step6: Depending on the grid you choose, you can upload up to 15 photos
step7: The images will automatically be positioned on the grid, so they may not be placed in the order you want
